GENERAL.INVALID_EMAIL_FORMAT: Formatul adresei de mail trebuie să fie john@doe.com.

FOOTER.ABOUT_TEXT: Conceput din pasiunea pentru cai și sportul ecvestru site-ul horse-spot.com oferă un sistem modern de vânzare a cailor din Europa și este gata sa satisfacă dorințele utilizatoilor de pretutindeni cu opțiuni avansate de căutare.
FOOTER.NEWSLETTER_TEXT: Abonează-te la newsletter-ul nostru pentru a primi informatii despre sportul ecvestru direct în inbox.
FOOTER.NEWSLETTER_SUCCESS_NOTIF_MSG: Acum ești o parte din comunitatea noastră. Vom împărtășile toate noutățile în inbox-ul tău.

LOGIN_PAGE.LOCAL_ACCOUNT_ERROR: Un cont local este deja înregistrat cu acest email, încearcă să te conectezi.
LOGIN_PAGE.FORGOT_EMAIL: Introdu adresa de email pentru a-ți reseta parola
LOGIN_PAGE.FORGOT_NOTIF_MSG: O nouă parolă a fost generată si trimisă pe adresa ta de email. Verificăți inbox-ul/spam-ul.

REGISTER_PAGE.INVALID_PASSWORD_FORMAT: Parola introdusă trebuie să conțină cel puțin 6 caractere.
REGISTER_PAGE.UNSUPPORTED_PROFILE_PIC_EXT: Formatul pozei de profil este prea mare.
REGISTER_PAGE.SIGNUP_TEXT: List unlimited number of horses. Easily manage and edit your posts. Create a wish list. Make and organize appointments.

APPOINTMENTS.TITLE: Întâlniri
APPOINTMENTS.GREEN_BAR: Totul este pregătit. Programarea va avea loc in data stabilită
APPOINTMENTS.NO_PENDING: Deocamdată nu ai nicio programare în așteptare. Folosind butonul fă o programare poți stabili cu ușurință o întâlnire.Using make appointment button on each horse page you can easily set up a meeting to see the horse.

APPOINTMENTS.PENDING_USERS_PLANNED: Users planned appointments for the following
APPOINTMENTS.CANCEL_MODAL_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Te rugăm să ne înștiințezi motivul anulării

ERROR_PAGE.NOT_FOUND_TEXT: Pagina pe care încerci să o accesezi nu poate fi găsită.

HORSE_AD_DETAIL.MARK_AS_SOLD: Prin marcarea acestui cal ca vândut, acesta va fi salvat ca o referință în profilul dvs.
HORSE_AD_DETAIL.JUST_DELETE: Dacă doriți doar să îl ștergeți, apăsați ștergeți.

SEND_MAIL_MODAL.EMAIL_INVALID: Formatul emailului trebuie să fie john@doe.com.

DELETE_MODAL.TITLE: Șterge calul
DELETE_MODAL.QUEST: Ești sigur că vrei să ștergi acest cal?
DELETE_MODAL.NOTE: Note: Toate programările associate vor fi șterse.

APP_NOT_LOGGED_IN_MODAL.MUST_BE_LOGGEDIN: Trebuie să fi logat pentru a avea acces.

HORSE_AD_DETAIL.MAKE_APP_NOTIF_SUCCESS_TEXT: Întâlnire programată cu success. Verificăți contul pentru noutăți.// Check the updates in your account.

HOME_PAGE.SEARCH_NOW_TEXT: Calul visat este mai aproape decât îți imaginezi.
HOME_PAGE.ADD_TEXT: Testează cea mai nouă experiență a tranzacțiilor de cai//Get the latest experience of online horse dealing.
HOME_PAGE.WHY_US_TEXT: Suntem călăreți.Știm ce te interesează și încercăm să îți ușurăm munca// We are horsemen. We know what you are looking for and we made it easy for you.
HOME_PAGE.ADV_SEARCH_TEXT: Pentru a fi sigur că vei găsi calul dorit site-ul nostru îți pune la dispoziție o varietate de motoare de căutare. Începând cu caracteristici de bază precum abilități, gen, rasă până la caracteristici avansate precum vârstă, înălțime maximă, experiență competițională, călăreț recomandat//To make sure you find exactly the horse you need we provide a large variety of search criterias. From basic characteristics like ability, gender and breed to more advance ones like age and height limits, competional experience, recommended rider and more. All the horses are grouped in price ranges so you can easily find the one suitable for your budget.
HOME_PAGE.HORSE_MNG_TEXT: Want to sell your horse? There is no better place to do it. We are trying to present your horse in a clear and modern way, provding all the details to the customers. At any time you can add unlimited number of horses and easily manage and them. Also, from a customer based perspective you can save all your favorite horses to a wish list and decide later which one to buy.
HOME_PAGE.APP_TEXT: Our appointment system is made to help you be more organized. Both parts receive the updates from an appointment through real time notifications and can keep track of them into their account. No more phone calls to set up a meeting, just ask for a date and go try the horse you want.

CONTACT_PAGE.TITLE: Contactează-ne
CONTACT_PAGE.TITLE_TEXT: Please feel free to write us about any thought, suggestion or complain you have about our website.
CONTACT_PAGE.TITLE_TEXT_2: Also, If you are interested to get involved in one of our projects do not hesitate to contact us.
CONTACT_PAGE.MAIL_SEND_NOTIF_SUCCES: Mesajul tău a fost trimis cu succes.

GET_INVOLVED_PAGE.TITLE: Implică-te
GET_INVOLVED_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Because we have a huge desire to help the equestrian sport development in central and estern Europe we present you the events we are keen to organize during the next years. We consider your involvement essential for the process of evolving.
GET_INVOLVED_PAGE.CLINICS: We plan to organize three jumping clincis per year. Each of the clinics will be held by a top rider or coach. In a sport that every detail counts, getting some inside tips and advices from the world's best riders can make the difference.
GET_INVOLVED_PAGE.AUCTIONS: We believe in a different auction system. A system where you register your horse, where the best twenty horses get selected and where you get the chance to present your horse in a high quality auction event.
GET_INVOLVED_PAGE.CIRCUIT: The HorseSpot Circuit is our big ambiton of organizing a high level circuit in central and estern Europe. We would like to plan a circuit that will cover classes for young horses, amateurs, children, juniors, young riders and seniors.

ABOUT_PAGE.TITLE: Despre noi
ABOUT_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: At HorseSpot we believe that developing a modern and robust online horse marketplace we can make a difference in your stable. The way we do it is by offering a solid and elegantly designed platform where stable owners get full advantage of a clear presentation of their horses and where customers are provided with countless search options in order to get the closest range of horses matching their wishes.
ABOUT_PAGE.PAUL: I consider HorseSpot the place where my deep love for horses meets my passion for technology. The whole concept came across my mind when I was looking online for horses. I felt that I can offer a better user experience. All my life I was surrounded by equestrians and I got to know their expectations regarding buying, selling and presenting horses. All of this helped us to design a modern platform suitable for every horsemen needs.
ABOUT_PAGE.BOGDAN: When Paul asked me to work with him I immediately said yes, without hesitation. I love people who are willing to work hard for something because I really believe in this process. Horse Spot is a user friendly platform and you can use it without encountering any problems in the process of posting, searching or adding horses to your wish list and many more features.
